GameDBLocalizedString.Text: Stanozolol

Stanozolol may be used in the long-term treatment of patients with hereditary angioedema provided such patients are closely supervised with routine clinical, biochemical, and radiologic assessments. \n\nRequired room: Any office
Miltefosine

Miltefosine, sold under the trade name Impavido among others, is a medication mainly used to treat leishmaniasis and free-living amoeba infections such as Naegleria fowleri and Balamuthia mandrillaris. \n\nRequired room: Any office
Zavesca
Zavesca is a medicine that is used to treat mild to moderate type 1 Gaucher disease in adults and it is also used to treat Niemann-Pick type C. \n\nRequired room: Any office
Biotin Capsules

Biotin (vitamin B7) is a vitamin found in foods like eggs, milk, and bananas. Oral Biotin is offered as an over the counter supplement and is used in the treatment of Biotin deficiency. \n\nRequired room: Any office
Berinert
Intravenous (IV) Infusion of Berinert(C1-INH concentrate). \n\nRequired room: Any ward / unit
Panhematin
Panhematin is a hemin for injection prescription medication used to relieve repeated attacks of acute intermittent porphyria. \n\nRequired room: Any ward / unit
Anticoagulants
Drugs preventing blood platelets to stick to each other and forming clots. \n\nRequired room: ICU / Office / Diagnostic unit at Cardiology dpt / General Surgery dpt / Department of Diagnostics
Dialysis

Is a process of removing the waste products from the cells metabolism from the bloodstream, when the kidneys are not able to maintain this function. 

Required room: Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt / Department of Diagnostics 

Required equipment: Dialysis machine
IV immunoglobulin
A purified blood product containing antibodies delivered by the intravenous (IV) route. \n\nRequired room: ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at Orthopaedy dpt / Neurology dpt / Department of Diagnostics
Diuretics

Medications that lower the amount of sodium and water in the body. \n\nRequired room: ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt / Internal Medicine dpt / Cardiology / Neurology / Department of Diagnostics
Medical removal of death tissue. \n\nRequired room: Office/Diagnostic unit / Burn unit at Traumatology dpt. / ICU / Trauma center at Emergency / Department of Diagnostics
